brainly_data.question: When considering creditworthiness, which person is likely to pay the greatest credit card finance charges if they all charge the same amount each month on their cards?
brainly_data.subject: Business

all_answers.question: When considering creditworthiness, which person is likely to pay the greatest credit card finance charges if they all charge the same amount each month on their cards?
all_answers.subject: Business
all_answers.text: I believe it's Mary Lou because if she pays full payment on her credit card every month, then it's very likely that she will pay full payment no matter the amount of the charge on the credit card every month.

top_answer.text: I believe it's Mary Lou because if she pays full payment on her credit card every month, then it's very likely that she will pay full payment no matter the amount of the charge on the credit card every month.
